title: My pixel 3a xl started shutting down randomly
content: I've had my phone over a year without no issues but suddenly yesterday the proximity sensor did not work out of no where, I then decided to reset the device and after my phone is shutting down after its turned of like after 10-30 seconds the issue is only when it's in battery when I plugged the phone into the charger it works as usual, even when reverse charging the phone is working fine what could be the fault?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
